title: Azrael
data:

| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                             | [damnation](/Damnation "Damnation") [rF+++](/Fire "Fire") [rPois+](/Poison "Poison") [rMiasma](/Miasma "Miasma") [rN+++](/Negative_energy "Negative energy") [rTorm](/Torment "Torment") |
| [Vulnerabilities](/Vulnerability "Vulnerability")                   | [Cold](/Cold "Cold") [Holy](/Holy "Holy")                                                                                                                                                |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | A powerful, belligerent efreet. (Is there any other kind?)***“And Allah said, ‘As thou the deed hast done, so now the office shall be thine, O Azrael, to gather up for me the souls of men and women when their time has come; the souls of saints and sinners, of beggars and of princes, of the old or young, whate’er befall; and even though friends weep, and hearts of loved ones ache with sorrow and with anguish, when bereft of those they love.’ So Azrael became the messenger of Death.” -J. E. Hanauer, \_Folk-lore of the Holy Land, Moslem, Christian and Jewish\_. 1907. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Location](#Location)
- [3 Spells](#Spells)
- [4 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [5 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Azrael the Boundless Flame** is a [unique](/Unique "Unique") [efreet](/Efreet "Efreet"), often accompanied by several [hell hounds](/Hell_hound "Hell hound") and [fire elementals](/Fire_elemental "Fire elemental"). Like all efreets, he comes armed with a [flaming](/Flaming "Flaming") [scimitar](/Scimitar "Scimitar"), but he's much happier hitting you with his wide variety of [Fire Magic](/Fire_Magic "Fire Magic") and [damnation](/Damnation "Damnation") spells instead.

## Location

- [The Dungeon](/The_Dungeon "The Dungeon"):12-15
- The [Orcish Mines](/Orcish_Mines "Orcish Mines"):2
- The [Elven Halls](/Elven_Halls "Elven Halls"):1-2
- [The Snake Pit](/The_Snake_Pit "The Snake Pit"):1-3
- The [Spider's Nest](/Spider%27s_Nest "Spider's Nest"):1-3

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                                          |                                                      |
| :---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Bolt of Fire](/Bolt_of_Fire "Bolt of Fire") (3d20)                      | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Fireball](/Fireball "Fireball") (3d20)                                  | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3       | [Hurl Damnation](/Hurl_Damnation "Hurl Damnation") (3d20)                | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot4       | [Call Down Damnation](/Call_Down_Damnation "Call Down Damnation") (3d15) | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- [Fire resistance](/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance") defends against most of his spells and melee, but nothing will protect you from [damnation](/Damnation "Damnation").

- His allies are immune to fire, so he can fire bolts through them.
  - However, the allies are not immune to damnation. Standing next to a hell hound or elemental will prevent him from using either damnation attack.

- Take note of what Azrael is and isn't vulnerable to:

  - As a [demon](/Demon "Demon"), Azrael is immune to [silence](/Silence "Silence").
  - He can't [see invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible"), so going invisible will greatly reduce the number of spells that hit you.
  - His [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower") is low for such a strong unique. A [wand of polymorph](/Wand_of_polymorph "Wand of polymorph") is likely to create a weak demon; the usual [Hexes](/Hexes "Hexes") and hex [wands](/Wand "Wand") also work well.
  - He is vulnerable to cold, so [Ice Magic](/Ice_Magic "Ice Magic") or a [wand of iceblast](/Wand_of_iceblast "Wand of iceblast") can deal decent damage quickly; this has the added benefit of tearing through his allies in short order.

## History

- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), Azrael was [vulnerable to water](/Category:Water_vulnerability "Category:Water vulnerability").
html:
Azrael

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Azrael R 
HP 58-118
HD 11
XP 1258
Speed 10
AC 10
EV 5
Will 40
Attack1 17 (hit: plain)


Resistances damnation
rF+++
rPois+
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities Cold
Holy
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Demonic
Size Large
Type efreet, efreet
Flags Evil
Flying
Speaks
Unique
Male
A powerful, belligerent efreet. (Is there any other kind?)

“And Allah said,
‘As thou the deed hast done, so now the office shall be thine, O Azrael,
to gather up for me the souls of men and women when their time has come;
the souls of saints and sinners, of beggars and of princes,
of the old or young, whate’er befall; and even though friends weep,
and hearts of loved ones ache with sorrow and with anguish,
when bereft of those they love.’
So Azrael became the messenger of Death.”

-J. E. Hanauer, _Folk-lore of the Holy Land, Moslem, Christian and Jewish_. 1907.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Location
  • 3 Spells
  • 4 Tips & Tricks
  • 5 History

Useful Info

Azrael the Boundless Flame is a unique efreet, often accompanied by several hell hounds and fire elementals. Like all efreets, he comes armed with a flaming scimitar, but he's much happier hitting you with his wide variety of Fire Magic and damnation spells instead.

Location

  • The Dungeon:12-15
  • The Orcish Mines:2
  • The Elven Halls:1-2
  • The Snake Pit:1-3
  • The Spider's Nest:1-3

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Bolt of Fire (3d20) Magical flag
Slot2 Fireball (3d20) Magical flag
Slot3 Hurl Damnation (3d20) Magical flag
Slot4 Call Down Damnation (3d15) Magical flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Fire resistance defends against most of his spells and melee, but nothing will protect you from damnation.
  • His allies are immune to fire, so he can fire bolts through them.
    • However, the allies are not immune to damnation. Standing next to a hell hound or elemental will prevent him from using either damnation attack.
  • Take note of what Azrael is and isn't vulnerable to:
    • As a demon, Azrael is immune to silence.
    • He can't see invisible, so going invisible will greatly reduce the number of spells that hit you.
    • His willpower is low for such a strong unique. A wand of polymorph is likely to create a weak demon; the usual Hexes and hex wands also work well.
    • He is vulnerable to cold, so Ice Magic or a wand of iceblast can deal decent damage quickly; this has the added benefit of tearing through his allies in short order.

History

  • Prior to 0.28, Azrael was vulnerable to water.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Azrael&oldid=75821"

rawPage:
{{version030}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Azrael the Boundless Flame''' is a [[unique]] [[efreet]], often accompanied by several [[hell hound]]s and [[fire elemental]]s. Like all efreets, he comes armed with a [[flaming]] [[scimitar]], but he's much happier hitting you with his wide variety of [[Fire Magic]] and [[damnation]] spells instead.

==Location==
*[[The Dungeon]]:12-15
*The [[Orcish Mines]]:2
*The [[Elven Halls]]:1-2
*[[The Snake Pit]]:1-3
*The [[Spider's Nest]]:1-3

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*[[Fire resistance]] defends against most of his spells and melee, but nothing will protect you from [[damnation]].
*His allies are immune to fire, so he can fire bolts through them. 
**However, the allies are not immune to damnation. Standing next to a hell hound or elemental will prevent him from using either damnation attack.
*Take note of what Azrael is and isn't vulnerable to:
**As a [[demon]], Azrael is immune to [[silence]].
**He can't [[see invisible]], so going invisible will greatly reduce the number of spells that hit you.
**His [[willpower]] is low for such a strong unique. A [[wand of polymorph]] is likely to create a weak demon; the usual [[Hexes]] and hex [[wand]]s also work well.
**He is vulnerable to cold, so [[Ice Magic]] or a [[wand of iceblast]] can deal decent damage quickly; this has the added benefit of tearing through his allies in short order.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.28]], Azrael was [[:Category:Water_vulnerability|vulnerable to water]].
